title: Document Embeddings JSON Schema
description: A representation for the vector embedding representation of content items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content item.

oneOf.description: The vector embedding representation of the content item as a single list.

items.description: A single number in the vector embedding of the document.

oneOf.description: The vector embedding representation of the content item as a list of lists (e.g., for chunked embeddings).

items.description: A single number in a chunk's vector embedding.

num_embeddings.description: The number of embeddings that were averaged to represent the content item.

len.description: The length of the original text (chars) from which the embedding was generated.

chunks.description: The number of chunks that were used to generate the embedding representation of the content item.

chunk_length.description: The maximum length of each chunk in tokens.

sys_id.description: Identifier for the system or model that generated the embedding, used for traceability.

ts.description: Timestamp indicating when the embedding was created (e.g., '2024-10-09T09:29:02Z').

embedder.description: Name of the embedding model used, including version or unique identifier.
